messages.title: Scotland's opportunity to make our voice heard loudly and clearly.
messages.content: The General Election on May 7th is Scotland's opportunity to make our voice heard loudly and clearly.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The SNP will oppose more austerity cuts and unfair policies like the Bedroom Tax and push for Scottish Home rule to create jobs and protect services.

mentions.candidate: Patrick Grady moved to Glasgow in 1997 to study at Strathclyde University. - He says: 'Our community needs a strong voice in Westminster. As your MP, I'll stand up for Glasgow North and make sure we're heard loud and clear.'

issues.governance: Neither can be trusted to deliver the powers Scotland was promised. With strong Scottish voices at Westminster we will hold the government of the day to account.

housing.content: Support for Scottish Home rule to create jobs and protect services.

politicalExperience.achievements: Heavily involved in the campaign against school closures proposed by the Labour-led city council at the time.

endorsements.endorsement: "Patrick will be a strong voice for you and your family."

images.caption: Patrick Grady – A strong local voice for Glasgow North.
"Patrick will be a strong voice for you and your family." - Nicola Sturgeon
